page.title: 14LOCAL HISTORY HOME LIFE
page.content: It was unknown for a wife to go out to work.She was{fully employed at home}. Each day had a work programme viz.{ {Monday-}wash day with its wash tubs,rubber and the hand turned iron wringing machine with its wooden rollers {Tuesday}ironing clothes with the flat iron or charcoal heated iron. {Wednesday-Thursday}baking day when sufficient bread was baked to last a week.{Friday}-cleaning day-black lead the fireside-clean the brass fender,poker,tongs and kettle.{ {Saturday} afternoon was the only time available for shopping for clothes, boots and other requisites. The church,chapel,working men's club and public houses were the only means of social contact. -
